item.description:
Join us for our 4th Annual Picnic Fundraiser!
Sunday, October 18, 2009
1:00-5:00 pm
Please join us for a day of fun on Sunday, October 18th to help support Maple Farm
Sanctuary. It will be an afternoon to enjoy the beautiful farm, foliage, music, raffles, speakers,
friends and of course the animals. The family-friendly event will feature a presentation from
Maple Farm Sanctuary co-founder Cheri Ezell-Vandersluis who will share the compelling
story of how she and her husband, Jim, abruptly ended their profitable generations-long meat
and dairy farming business to create a safe haven for animals Please welcome our guest
speaker, Harold Brown, a former beef farmer and founder of FarmKind who has made the
transition from animal based to plant based agriculture.
For a $10.00 donation per adult (children under 12 free) please come and picnic in
the fields behind the barn (bring your own blanket or chairs). There will be some sandwiches,
drinks and desserts as well, but make sure you get there early as we may run out!.
Maple Farm Sanctuary is an animal sanctuary providing lifelong homes for abused, abandoned and
unwanted farmed animals while promoting veganism and respect for all life through public information. They
will live the remainder of their lives in peace, free to roam and meander the land.
Maple Farm Sanctuary
101 North Ave, Mendon, MA 01756
www.maplefarmsanctuary.org
There is free parking at the farm. Sorry but please leave your dogs at home so our animals stay calm.
item.name: Maple Farm Sanctuary Annual Picnic - Mendon, MA
